title: Boy shoots himself in the foot while hunting
content:
WAITSFIELD, Vt. —
A 13-year-old boy accidentally shot himself in the foot Wednesday while hunting in Waitsfield, police said.
The boy was taken to the University of Vermont Medical Center and was expected to be OK, according to state police.
The accident happened around 4:10 p.m. at a property on Elkhorn Road.
